summary:
I create revenue growth out of raw data.

Former Head of Data & Growth in an ecommerce agency, I created the department from scratch and led a team of 5 Data Scientists and CRO Specialists. I was managing and hands-on; As a data scientist by trade, I built data pipelines, dashboards, and machine learning models using SQL and Python. I am now using my management and technical skills to help companies grow.

Preferred tool stack: Snowflake, BigQuery, Google Cloud Platform, dbt Core, dbt Cloud, Looker Studio, PowerBI
Language: Python, SQL

school.name: Solvay Brussels School of Economics and Management

certifications.name: Building Resilient Streaming Analytics Systems on GCP
Modernizing Data Lakes and Data Warehouses with GCP
Smart Analytics, Machine Learning, and AI on GCP
Building Batch Data Pipelines on GCP
Google Cloud Platform Big Data and Machine Learning Fundamentals
Working with Dates and Times in Python
Introduction to Data Visualization with Matplotlib
Introduction to Data Visualization with Seabor
Introduction to Importing Data in Python

profile_positions.description:
Datablaze is a platform that helps CRO specialist make deep dive of their experiments' result. What GA4 does not allow with their HyperLogLog ++, we enable it. Our tool works with the GA4 raw data and provide you the unsampled results, aka the real numbers behind your AB tests.

-------------------------
We also provide consultancy services: We help companies build data infrastructure to unveil growth potential in their data. Specializing in e-commerce, we excel at turning numbers into actionable insights. we can build data pipelines, dashboards, and machine-learning algorithms.

Specialized in tools as:
- Snowflake
- DBT
- PowerBI & Looker Studio
- Google Cloud Platform (Big query, Cloud Composer, etc.)
- Google Tag Manager (client-side and server-side)

Coding in:
- Python
- SQL
profile_positions.title: Founder & Data Scientist

profile_positions.description:
As Head of Data & Growth, I was leading the most innovative department of Ask Phill. The role includes managerial, commercial, and technical responsibilities:
- I led of team of 5 people, a mix of CRO specialists and Data scientists.
- I reached product-market fit and then profit in the first 6 months.
- With my team, we have built innovative services sold to more than 10 ecommerces.
- Hands-on Data Scientist, I built myself machine learning models for a few clients.
- Additionally to my team, one salesperson and one marketing person were reporting to me.
- I used daily SQL and Python 
- My daily toolstack was Snowflake, DBT, GA4, Google Tag Manager, GCP and PowerBi
profile_positions.title: Head of Data & Growth

profile_positions.description: As Data Scientist, I connect the data to highlights ecommerce growth opportunities.
profile_positions.title: Data Scientist

profile_positions.description:
As a marketing data analyst,  I used machine learning and data analysis to feed insights to the marketing team, and particularly, the Growth Hacking team.
- I used SQL, Python and Dataiku to gather insights.
- I created and maintained Power BI dashboards.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Data Analyst

profile_positions.description:
As the head of the digital marketing, I am in charge of the SEO and SEA of the company. I am managing and training of team of 8 people to implement the SEO of our 8 internationals websites.
www.greenonline.nl
profile_positions.title: Head of Digital Marketing

profile_positions.description:
Jouls is a startup providing energy saving thanks to IoT. We used smart plugs and smart meters to automate energy saving in offices. Our technology could detect energy leakage and stop them without human intervention.
My tasks were to ensure the marketing and the sales as much as leading the team.

We used a combination of smart meters and smart plugs to automate electricity savings in companies. We save up to 11% of the final electricity bills. The startup achieve to reach traction by serving multiple paid clients.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description:
*Startup which created the world's most efficient solar charger.*
As head of sales and marketing, I led the product-market fit research (customer interviews and feedback, and market research). Using digital marketing, I helped the company growth through paid channels and A/B testing of the UX.
http://sunslice-solar.com/
profile_positions.title: Head Of Sales Marketing

profile_positions.description: As Freelancer in Digital Marketing in the incubator VentureLab North, I helped numerous startups to grow through digital marketing. I applied the lean startup principles to help them find their product-market fit. I worked with company in the healthcare as much as in cleantech.
profile_positions.title: Freelancer in Digital Marketing

profile_positions.description:
Rocket your website growth!
You are a small company having trouble finding new customers? Your network starts to be saturated? let us bring you to the next step: finding customers online.
Orbyt is the digital marketing agency you need!

volunteer_experiences.description:
•	As boy-scout leader,
     o	I led a staff of 8 assistants during 15 days of scout camp and was responsible for the      security, planning and well-being of 50 people. 
     o	I organized with a staff, 18 activities/year for 40 teenagers.
     o	I welcomed 10 new staff members. I trained them, counseled and mentored these different new staff members.

I worked in different staffs to organize summer camps. The last one was a camp of 25 teenagers. It lasted 10 days and the teenagers slept on site. This camp required approximately 10 full days of preparation for each of the 9 members of the staff during the year. The budget managed was over €10.000

As handyman, I did a broad range of different tasks. From ordering the different events to managing the catering and the cash register. It includes a great flexilibility in your time schedule to be present in any case of problems.
The task of barman includes the same responsabilities but is more focused on the managing and the supplying of the bar. The barmen must do the check-in and check-out of any event

Project Manager in the Belgian boy-scout association “LesScouts”
